name: Accurate
content: Some weapons are designed with precision in mind and respond superbly in skilled hands. They grant an additional bonus of +10 to the firer's Ballistic Skill when used with an Aim Action in addition to the bonus Aiming grants. When firing a single shot from a single Accurate Basic Weapon, if such an attack also uses the Aim action, it gains an extra 1d10 of damage for every two degrees of success to a maximum of two extra d10.
